hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah used to say:"Do not fast one or two days ahead of the month, unless the one who used to observe a regular fast. In that case let him fast

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّسْهِيلِ فِي صِيَامِ يَوْمِ الشَّكِّ
chapter.eng-name: Lenience Concerning Fasting the day of Doubt
